definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
to topple (i.e. knock over)/to capsize/fig. to overturn (a regime, by plotting or subversion)/to undermine/to subvert
to turn upside down/to reverse/back to front/confused/deranged/crazy
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
homeless and miserable (idiom); to wander about in a desperate plight/to drift
lit. to invert black and white (idiom); to distort the truth deliberately/to misrepresent the facts/to invert right and wrong
to harp on/over and over/merely ring changes on a few terms

sentences.english: In Shangba the river brings death not sustenance.
sentences.chinese: 河流給上壩帶來顛杌是生機，而是死亡。

sentences.english: On the base that plays sanded bag in adroitness control, let a student change bump handball.
sentences.chinese: 在熟練掌握踢沙包的基礎上，讓學生改換顛手球。

sentences.english: Only pneumococcal meningitis had a peak incidence in spring.
sentences.chinese: 又只有肺炎雙球菌有明顯的春季流行顛峯峯。

sentences.english: Nestled in the Himalayas, bordering the world's highest peak, Mount Everest, lies tiny landlocked Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗瑪峯雄踞世界屋脊喜馬拉雅山顛。

definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
to wind around/to wrap round/to coil/tangle/to involve/to bother/to annoy
to pay no attention to/to disregard/to ignore/to let go unpunished/to let off
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex
rich/abundant/exuberant/to add for free/to throw in as bonus/to spare/to forgive/despite/although
poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
